ip address.pattern: (how (do|can) i find my server ip address|ip)
ip address.response: You can find your server IP address by logging into your panel, clicking on your server, and checking the server IP address section.

pull files.response: To pull a file, go to the Files tab -> Pull File -> Paste the URL and location where you want the file to be pulled.

changing server.pattern: (how (do|can) i change my server type|server jar|server type)
changing server.response: To change your server type, you can install Optifine by...

changing java version.pattern: (how (do|can) i change my server java type|server java version|my java version)
changing java version.response: You can change your server Java version by going to the Startup tab -> View the Docker Image Section -> Click the drop down.

changing build version.pattern: (how (do|can) i change my server build version|server build|my build type)
changing build version.response: You can change your server build type by clicking the Startup tab -> View the Build Number Section -> Enter your build number.

startup arguments.pattern: (how (do|can) i change my server startup arguments|startup flags|server flags)
startup arguments.response: You can change your server startup arguments by clicking the Startup tab -> View the startup arguments Section -> Enter your startup arguments.

mysql database.response: To create a MySQL database, go to the Database tab -> Create Database.

schedules.response: To create a schedule, go to the Schedule tab -> Create Schedule -> Follow the schedule creation guide.

sub user.response: To create a sub-user, go to the User tab -> New User -> Fill out the user's email information.

backups.response: To create a backup, go to the Backups tab -> New Backup.

allocations.pattern: (how (do|can) i create an allocation|additional port|extra port)
allocations.response: To create an allocation for additional ports, go to the Allocations tab -> New Allocation.

ftp.response: You can find your server SFTP credentials by clicking the Settings tab -> View the SFTP Details section -> Copy your SFTP credentials.

reinstall.pattern: (how (do|can) i reinstall my server|reinstall my files|reinstall)
reinstall.response: You can reinstall your server files by clicking the Settings tab -> View the Reinstall Server section -> Click Reinstall Server.

server pfp.pattern: (how (do|can) i make a server pfp|server icon)
server pfp.response: Check out a brief knowledge article on how to do so [here](https://github.com/).

unzip.response: You can unzip a folder by right-clicking the folder and selecting 'Extract' or 'Unarchive'.
